Property.description_en: Premier Properties is pleased to present the semi-furnished 1 bedroom plus office apartment in Porto Arabia, The Pearl. Located on a mid-floor this luxurious unit features following: • Master bedroom with dressing area and built in wardrobes • Spacious open-plan lounge and dining area • Semi-open plan kitchen • Office room • 2 bathrooms - one with bathtub and other with glass paneled shower cab Tower Facilities: Tower facilities for residents include a beautiful outdoor swimming pool, a modern well-equipped gym and entertainment lounge. There is no balcony with this unit however, there are stunning sea and marina views from its high vantage point • Swimming pool • Well-equipped gymnasium • Entertainment lounge • 24/7 concierge service Available on an immediate-to-occupy basis with centralized A/C and allocated parking for one vehicle * Agency fee is applicable. For additional information / to book a viewing, kindly contact us.
